name: Blast
full_text: Blast creates an area attack using a Medium Blast Template. Targets inside take 2d6 damage (or 3d6 with a raise).
notes: Cannot be cast in melee without provoking free attacks.

name: Holy Symbol
summary: Protects the bearer against evil creatures.
full_text: When invoked, the bearer radiates faith that wards off supernatural foes. Evil entities must make a Spirit roll to attack directly.
notes: Requires a visible symbol of faith.
